snippet: A production featuring refugees from the Democratic Republic of Congo is part of the Undesirable Elements series at LaMaMa in which nonactors from marginalized groups tell their stories.
abstract: Production of Cry for Peace: Voices From the Congo, featuring refugees from the Democratic Republic of Congo, is part of the Ping Chong & Company's Undesirable Elements series at LaMaMa in which non-actors from marginalized groups tell their stories.
lead_paragraph: A production featuring refugees from the Democratic Republic of Congo is part of the Undesirable Elements series at LaMaMa in which nonactors from marginalized groups tell their stories.

headline.seo: Ping Chong Delivers a New Set of Undesirable Elements Plays
headline.main: Congo’s Pain, Told by Those Who Lived It
headline.print_headline: Congo’s Pain, Told by Those Who Lived It
